reviewText: While these movies and books appeal to contain good Christian moral values the fact of the matter is they are made to support the leaders of the cult formerly known as the Children of God, that changed their name to The Family International. Just like you wouldn't buy clothes you knew were made by child slaves, you won't want to buy these videos knowing that the people who made them are well known pedophiles. And ultimately the people most befitting from the sale of them are the Cult leaders themselves. All this information is well documented and easy to find with a quick google search

Do not buy this product you are supporting pedophiles. This product is made by the group formerly known as the Children of God and later The Family international. Due to a lot of bad press they have separated their branding from the cult but it is still run by members who funnel this money straight to their leader Karen Zerbys pockets. The children from TFI have suffered terrible abuse in their childhood including sexual, physical and mental abuse all which is well documented. Some survivors of  the cult are well known River Phoenix, Joaquin Phoenix, Rose McGowen. Julianna Burring, Taylor Stevens. Some great books you can read about them are Not without my Sister, and The Innocent. Here is a link on the practices and beliefs of the cult. [...]
My 2 toddler boys LOVE the Cherub movies!!  Keeps them very engaged and they all have a great message to teach!!

Sadly, this DVD (the last one in the series so far) is very loud. The volume of the music is unpleasantly high, which is very unhealthy, and the instruments they use are very noisy, which is not God-pleasing. Even worse, the story is not Biblically accurate. It's a pity, considering all the previous DVDs (1 to 14) are excellent.
I recommend that all children should see this and for parents to order from Amazon.
